basics.name: Ricky Bok
basics.label: Frontend Engineer
basics.summary: Senior Typescript Engineer with 17+ years of front and back-end web development experience. I have expertise in leading multinational software development teams, designing, documenting, implementing, and delivering software solutions that span across platforms.

experience.name: Privitar
experience.summary: Hands on front end application development with complex forms and customised behaviour. Technologies used include Typescript, React, GraphQL, Cypress.
responsibilities: System Design and Project Management. Ensure projects were delivered on time and expectations were managed across the teams. My responsibilities also included documenting, designing API, and user flow requirements for different features.
Mentoring members of the team to foster knowledge sharing and maintain high coding standards.
Participated in code reviews and contributed to improving coding standards within the team.

experience.name: digi.me
experience.summary: Hands on full stack web application development with projects for desktop, web and a javascript SDK.
responsibilities: Led a development team of five to implement and deliver company products utilising both Waterfall and Agile software development methodologies.
Developed a desktop MacOS/Windows client to view user data. Built on Electron using Typescript, React, React-virtualized, Redux Saga, Styled Components, Jest.
Developed a Node.js SDK to help third parties utilise the digi.me private sharing platform. Used Typescript, and runtime type checking using io-ts
Developed internal full stack web applications or engineering tools. Built on Next.JS or Express.JS frameworks, using Typescript, React, Xstate.

experience.name: SmallWorlds
experience.summary: Worked on a cross platform digital imaging point of sales software which allowed users to design and create their own photobooks/canvas etc. online or on kiosks. I was involved in a major overhaul of the software that included using templates that instructed how elements are laid out on the fly.
responsibilities: Led a development team of five to implement and deliver company products utilising both Waterfall and Agile software development methodologies.

Developed a Node.js SDK to help third parties utilise the digi.me private sharing platform. Used Typescript, and runtime type checking using io-ts
Developed internal full stack web applications or engineering tools. Built on Next.JS or Express.JS frameworks, using Typescript, React, Xstate.

experience.name: Familia H Tours
experience.summary: Worked in a travel agency in Guadalajara, Mexico and helped with their social media presence and video editing.

experience.name: italki
experience.summary: I've been an online language tutor teaching students from all over the world. I've taught English, Cantonese, and Mandarin.
